text: Kal Penn (born Kalpen Suresh Modi; April 23, 1977) is an American actor, producer, and civil servant. He is best known for his role as Lawrence Kutner on the Fox television program House. He is also well known for appearing in the movies Harold & Kumar Go to White Castle (2004), Harold & Kumar Escape from Guantanamo Bay (2008), and A Very Harold & Kumar 3D Christmas (2011). Penn was born in Montclair, New Jersey. He is the son of an Indian family. He started acting after graduating from the University of California, Los Angeles in 1998. He lives in Los Angeles, California. Penn was the Associate Director in the White House Office of Public Engagement for Barack Obama from 2009 through 2011. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1977 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from New Jersey Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American movie producers Category:American civil servants Category:Democrats (United States) Category:People from Montclair, New Jersey
title: Kal Penn
